column2: this is THE best BBQ in the city
column3: although there are several places that are a close second. Pulled pork has a great smoky flavor with some burnt strands for added flavor. Vinegar sauce is almost as good as we had when we lived in Carolina. Brisket is also smoky with burnt crust
column4: and very tasty with their sweet sauce. Texas sausage has a nice spicy kick too.
